attributes.review: I am a proud southern woman from the south who takes PRIDE in being a southern American and to see how poorly the app is is just a showing of how poorly America is run. I just wanted to say the porn pop ups were not appreciated. The app gave me a virus and now whenever my phone turns on porn pop ups raid my phone and then my phone connects to Bluetooth devices such as ALEXA and it oh my lord the amount of times there was just SCREAMING AND MOANING coming out of my loud speakers🤧 this app is horrifying and I don’t condone this kind of behavior. GOD AWFUL. YOU GEN Z KIDS PROBABLY HACKED THE APP YOU KIDS WEREN'T RAISED RIGHT YOU KIDS NEED TO GO TO CHURCH.
attributes.title: WARNING DO NOT PURCHASE APP

attributes.review:
I was in my way to go get some lunch. I decided chipotle was good, so I went over to chipotle but then i got lost and I ended up at a gas station. To make matters worse it wasn’t even a nice gas station. So I had to try to look up how to get there on my phone.... but i didn’t have service ! So I figured it out and I found chipotle and then I was happy again. But now I’m sunburnt from being out all day and that hurts. 
But yeah this app is terrible. It’s slow and it took all my internet so my phone didn’t have any signal to find chipotle. Thanks a lot rachel.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app is DEMONIC. I tried to download it, and while it was downloading, my hair CAUGHT ON FIRE, my dog decided to SH!T(excuse my language) on me, and I almost died from choking on nothing!? ITS LIKE it summoned a DEMON??! Anyways, after that, the app wouldn’t open! It kept crashing over and over, and when it finally did open, my phone started to BLARE INAPPROPRIATE MUSIC! I immediately got rid of it because of all the horrible things it had made me gone through... I’m SCARRED THANKS TO IT... and while I usually don’t share this information with others... I am now seeing a therapist thanks to this app.. DONT GET IT PLEASE!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: My name is Karen. I downloaded this app because I supported Donald Jenius Trump. I was so wrong. Upon opening, it asked for my credit card info. I believed that it was for easy donations, but my credit card has been charged over $700,000! I downloaded this app yesterday! And, this app has somehow used all of my internet. My phone barely works now that I’ve been on the app for only 10 minutes! I refuse to believe that this app and presidential candidate are good enough to govern over my daughter, Mickaulëaigh. This is DESPICABLE!!! I will definitely be speaking to corporate.
attributes.title: I can’t believe this!

i hate this app so bad its taking alot of space in my phone then when i tried to remove it it didn’t get removed and the app got frozen  to i dont think you should get this app its so bad and I think it’s hacking my phone and it took 7 days to download and the loading screen looks so bad I had to stare at it for 90 minutes i hate this app don’t waste your time getting this horrible app I hate it so much that I would get another bad app then this app AND IM VERY ANNOYED THAT I HAD TO STARE AT THAT LOADING SCREEN FOR 90 MINUTES DONT WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS APP

attributes.title: THIS APP IS SO BAD😤😡

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I saw it in suggested. I thought, maybe trump isn’t so bad. So once I downloaded it I was looking through to see what it was about and a black man walked past me. I support BLM but for some reason after downloading this app I became a racist bigot & started yelling racial slurs at him. I realized it was wrong & deleted the app immediately & it stopped so I redownloaded it to see if it was me or the app. It was the app. I dont know what type of racial voodoo they use but this app is not good & it will make you a white supremacists. If I could give 0 stars I would. 😌
attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME CHANT RACIAL SLURS AT POC

attributes.userName: this is so dumb leave me alone
attributes.review: First of all, when I open the app, the first thing I get is a title page asking for my phone number?! I don’t want my personal information to go to these people! Next thing I want to address was after downloading the app, it was veryyy glitchy and kept closing every time I opened it. I know what you’re going to ask, “maybe stop closing out of the application and then you’ll be able to use it” and my answer for you is no. I’d much prefer to never go onto that app ever again thank you very much.
attributes.title: Very Glitchy and Bad

attributes.review: This app made me so upset, I wanted more information on the trump runnings and such but it took farrrrrr too long to download and I sensed it hacking into my phone, I think it deserves below one star but we’ll get into that later, The fonts were huge and in fact the entire app looks like it took maybe an hour to create, I thought the president would be better than that, maybe I was wrong. I wish Bernie hadn’t dropped out, he’d know how to make an app!! This really made me angry!! I wish the worst of luck!
attributes.title: I can’t believe how terrible this app really was
